description.desc1: The Turntable MK1 is a custom build turntable based on a stepper motor, laser cutted plexi and an arduino controller. The design of the table and the arduino code is opensource.

turntable version.descript: select the version of the turntable to connect to.

open.descript: opens the editor for the script. Better don't touch.

Stage.descript: displays the visualization of the turntable in the 3DViewer

serial port.descript: choose the serial port where the turntable is attached to

use.descript: select the means of setting the speed

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
